nodes.text: The Nau'ur-class yacht, also commonly known as the Kalevalan star yacht or just Kalevalan, were a make of custom-order luxurious yacht manufactured by Kalevala Spaceworks. Notable Nau'ur-class yachts included the First Light, owned by Dryden Vos, a high ranking member of the criminal Crimson Dawn syndicate, and the Coronet, owned by Duchess Satine Kryze of Mandalore.
